title: Email Account Messages Gone After Changing Settings
content:
Hi,

I changed the settings on an email account in Thunderbird to imap from pop3 as well as with a different host. Now everything is gone.

Is there any way to get them back? :(

Thanks for any suggestions.

ginger
creator: ginger213

title: Thunderbird stopped working
content: Thunderbird has ceased working. There has been no changes on my end, nothing different, it just stopped working. No emails whatsoever. Very, very inconvenient I dont need information as to what I can do as nothing has changed at my end. .
creator: accounts303

title: Thunderbird outgoing emails being blocked because of "spam".
content:
Hello, I have been having a problem with sending a lot of my emails over the last month. It usually starts with trying to forward an email from a trusted source to another because it contains information they want/need. Usually both are family. Even when I have paired it down to just a new outgoing email and only told the other family member that here is the address for our son and the house he and his wife are buying and the address so they can look it up I still get the following message from Thunderbird and denying to send it: "Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: [VO-101] Message blocked due to spam content in the message.. Please check the message and try again."

What can I do to sort this out and get my emails working again? Thank you! Stewart
creator: stewartadams

title: Cannot receive subaddressed emails?
content:
I transitioned to Thunderbird fairly recently, and I've encountered a problem with how I get certain emails. With my old email, I would have certain subscriptions signed up with a subaddressed email, or plus addressed- i.e. "email@domain.com" being the primary account and "email+netflix@domain.com" being for my Netflix account, for instance.

I've noticed that since transitioning, I don't receive any of those subaddressed emails, but when I check on my Macbook (just the default Mail application) all of them are there.

Can anyone help me understand why this is? I like Thunderbird as it's been fairly simple to set up and customize how I like to read my emails, and I'm looking for a solution to this - or an alternative.
creator: kattnip.official

title: google calendar events from e-mails are not showing in thunderbird
content:
None of the topics really apply.

I recently booked a trip and Google imported the reservations from the confirmation e-mails. They show up on my Google calendar and on my Android phone, but not in my Thunderbird calendar. This was not an issue when I booked a trip in December for January.

Why can't I see ALL of the entries that are in my Google calndar (the reservation is in the same calendar as my day-to-day events)?

title: Thunderbird Won't Send Message due to spam content
content: On occasion when sending out a message, Thunderbird blocks it from going out due to the server saying it is (VO-1) message not sent due to spam content. It says Sending Of The Message Failed. An Error Occurred When Sending Mail. The mail server responded [VO-1] Message blocked due to spam content in the message. check the message and try again. How can I override T-bird and send these messages out.. In this specific incident, I'm trying to send my daughter a cookie recipe which has NO spam in it but T-Bird won't send it.
creator: ja8483722

title: How do I delete a message from ATT's server WITHOUT reading it, just remove it THERE?
content:
I'd like to delete certain obnoxious email feeds from the server [AT&T] upstream at the server, WITHOUT downloading them. These are email messages that don't have an "unsubscribe" feature added. I want to make them GONE, without having anything further to do with them, or the "organizations" these sending represent. Any advice would be welcome. The option "Delete from POP3 Server" doesn't do the job [and may be the wrong thing; I don't know].

Thankx!

The Gray Cat << tmc@att.net >>
creator: WriteStuff

title: When I open an email today, I need the date to show, along with the time -- the date is supressed on today's email.
content:
I hope you don't mind if I re-ask for everyone's help.

The last time I posted this unresolved issue was July of 2016.

All I need is that on every email I open, that email will have both the date and time displayed. At present, when I open a new email received today, the date is missing (suppressed), it only shows the time. If I open an older email, say from yesterday, the date and time will display just fine.

This simple request is to always have the date showing on every email, including today's email, where the date does not display.

Rationale: I open every email the same day received (100+ per day) and none show the date. Most are responded-to and closed. Some emails are part of multi-day projects and will remain open until the project completes, perhaps several days or a week later, being repeatedly looked at for details during phone calls or portions copied to others by email --- but none show the date, which is frequently critical to prioritizing their importance. They are left on a monitor like organized post-it notes, always in view, looked at many times a day for reference against the project they are related to. The only way to get a date to show, is to wait until the next day, and close-reopen each and every email --- it's a real nuisance.

Thank you to everyone who's trying to help, It's very appreciated.
creator: chart

title: Import from Outlook 2024
content: Hi, I have Outlook 2024 and not able to Import all my files to Mozilla Thunderbird. I click on Import from Outlook, it churns then closes Thunderbird. Appears my calendar imported but do not see any of my Personal Folders. Help would be much appreciated. Thanks, Arnie
creator: arnie5

creator: lynnecolin

title: How can I add a Gmail label to every message in a Thunderbird Local Folder?
content:
For years when I shop online I have been manually moving order confirmation emails to a Local Folder called "Orders" so I can search them do e.g. reorder items. When I began using Thunderbird as a Gmail client, I continued the practice. But this isn't a Gmail-centric way of doing things, and I can't search my Thunderbird local folder when I'm accessing Gmail remotely on my phone.

So going forward I want to add the Gmail label "Orders" to each order confirmation email. But what do I do with my legacy Thunderbird Local Folder messages? I need some way to tell Thunderbird: 'For each message in this Local Folder, tell Gmail to label it with the Gmail label "Orders"'. Is there an easy way to do that? If not, is there some way I could harvest the Message IDs of the messages and run some script (perhaps one I have to write myself)?

There are >2,000 messages in the folder, so doing this by hand one-by-one is simply not a viable option. I'm happy to roll up my sleeves and do some scripting work though. Thanks for any advice, even if it is just "you're out of luck". :)
creator: curtis21

title: Reply All Button Not Showing
content:
If I receive an email where there is no "To:" recipient, an "Cc:" and several people in "Bcc:" (of which I am one), there is no "Reply All" button available in the header bar. It is still possible to reply to all by right-clicking the email in the inbox, or using CTRL-SHIFT-R, but I was wondering what causes it and how it can be fixed.

I have seen a couple of similar questions where it is recommended to go to "Customize" under the header's "More" menu, but this does not contain an option of adding "Reply All" for me (and also, I cannot get to the "Customize" option by right-clicking on the header).

Note 1: This only applies to the above situation. If there is a "To:" recipient, the "Reply All" is always there.

Note 2: This is not consistent behaviour. If I send an email with one of my addresses in Cc and three others in Bcc, some will have the "Reply All" button visible while others not. Makes me want to scratch my brain.

Any thoughts?

(Am adding a screenshot of the missing button)

Running: Thunderbird 128.6.0esr on Fedora 41
creator: Pioppeto

title: Geluidsmelding op Pixel7A met gehoorapparaat
content:
Gebruik een Widex SmartRic gehoorapparaat met Moment App op de Pixel 7A telefoon. (Android-versie 15) Heb Google al benaderd maar verwijzen naar Thunderbird.

Het probleem: Is dat ik geen geluidsmeldingen krijg van de push-berichten op mijn telefoon. Erg vervelend! Alle Settings diverse malen door gelopen maar kom niet verder. Waar kan het aan liggen, toestel of de software? Graag een oplossing. Mvgr.

title: Google not transferring mail to thunderbird?
content: I have Thunderbird mail. I have had it for years. But it has been hacked ? by whom. I believe it is Google. As I have a Gnome account and they constantly want me to delete it. And I am unable to get my mail on Thunderbird because Google it appears won't send it. I have a google account on my Linux Mint. I have checked my google account and password. I am also unable to upload photos on Facebook Lite. I uploaded an embarrassing block of my email by our Health Minister Mary Ann Thomas and I have been hacked ever since. I don't understand why Google would be involved if its only the Victorian state Government. Are you able to help me. I am going to get an external CD rom and load Duckduckgo on it to see if this will help. I don't write code but can understand basic concepts and load via instructions. I'm a 78 year old widow with a lot of discernment. The Victorian Australia situation worries me and I talk about it. I'm wondering if we have any free speech at all
creator: mortimer1steph

title: Thunderbird synchroniseert niet alle accounts
content:
In Thunderbird heb ik 2 accounts staan die verbinding maken met dezelfde IMAP server. Alle instellingen zijn gelijk, behalve het emailadres en het wachtwoord. 1 account werkt goed, verzenden en ontvangen lukt.

Bij het andere account kan ik alleen nog maar verzenden. Er komt geen mail binnen, terwijl ik die wel zie staan op de webmail. Hij wil dus niet synchroniseren, terwijl tijdens opstarten links onder komt te staan dat hij de server gaat opzoeken en ook verbonden is. Verder geen foutmeldingen. Het probleem is gekomen nadat ik heel veel mails in Thunderbird naar een lokale map heb verplaatst. Dus ik dacht dat het probleem een kwestie van tijd is, maar na een dag wachten is het probleem er nog. Ook in de 'veilige modus' wanneer ik Thunderbird opstart met de shift ingedrukt.

Wat kan het zijn? / Wat kan ik doen om het op te lossen?
creator: marien3

title: Thunderbird Now Won't Read Or Send Email On Win 10
content:
I've been using Thunderbird on my Win10 PC for many many years, (and donated to Mozilla) and all has been fine till mid December. Emails still work fine on my Android phone and tablet using the Gmail app for my main Gmail email address and K9 app for an old email address, but on my PC using Thunderbird they both suddenly stopped around mid December. I can't give an exact date as I'm now disabled so only use my PC every fortnight or so just to keep everything up to date.

Thunderbird is using the server settings recommended by Melbpc group and they haven't changed for years. I also use Nord VPN which recently underwent what seemed a major upgrade so I turned that off - no difference.

I then tried manually instigating a download of my primaryÂ Gmail email on the pc using Thunderbird and watched as it said "connecting to Â imap.gmail.com", then "connected toÂ imap.gmail.com" but then nothingÂ happened.

Everything is totally up to date - Win 10, Thunderbird etc..

Can anybody suggest what the cause might be please?
creator: covo2

title: Thunderbird hangs and fails to send GPG mail
content:
I have set up GPG on my own computer. My friends computer is on the same system, F41, Sway, Thunderbird. All updated. My GPG in Thunderbird works, and the other system hangs for around 30 seconds then return â€œfailed to send mailâ€. The error console returns the following:

16:07:29.888 openpgp: rnp_key_export_autocrypt FAILED RNP.sys.mjs:5083:16 16:08:30.700 EnigmailFuncs.sync() failed result: TypeError: typedArray is null 

   isASCIIArmored chrome://openpgp/content/modules/RNP.sys.mjs:3732    encryptAndOrSign chrome://openpgp/content/modules/RNP.sys.mjs:3762    sync chrome://openpgp/content/modules/funcs.sys.mjs:502    encryptMessageStart chrome://openpgp/content/modules/encryption.sys.mjs:406    finishCryptoEncapsulation chrome://openpgp/content/modules/mimeEncrypt.sys.mjs:442    createMessageFile resource:///modules/MimeMessage.sys.mjs:83

funcs.sys.mjs:492:17 16:08:30.707 Error: encryptMessageStart FAILED: -1 mimeEncrypt.sys.mjs:455:15 16:08:30.707 mailnews.send: NS_ERROR_XPC_JAVASCRIPT_ERROR_WITH_DETAILS: [JavaScript Error: "encryptMessageStart FAILED: -1" {file: "chrome://openpgp/content/modules/mimeEncrypt.sys.mjs" line: 455}]'[JavaScript Error: "encryptMessageStart FAILED: -1" {file: "chrome://openpgp/content/modules/mimeEncrypt.sys.mjs" line: 455}]' when calling method: [nsIMsgComposeSecure::finishCryptoEncapsulation] createMessageFile resource:///modules/MimeMessage.sys.mjs:83 MessageSend.sys.mjs:147:32 16:08:30.707 mailnews.send: Sending failed; , exitCode=2153185313, originalMsgURI= MessageSend.sys.mjs:341:32 16:08:30.719 TypeError: typedArray is null RNP.sys.mjs:3732:7

We followed the instructions Encrypt emails with Thunderbird and GPG | Bacardi55's Web Cave and GPG Keys Management :: Fedora Docs which as I said results in my other system working as intended.

Could the non-working system be missing a package or a pointer set incorrectly? GPG and GPGME are installed. Keys are configured.

Cross posted at https://discussion.fedoraproject.org/t/thunderbird-hangs-and-fails-to-send-gpg-mail/145419
creator: theprogram

title: How to remove languages variants ?
content:
I'm running TB 128.7.1esr (64-bit) on my Linux Mint 22.1. I installed TB via the software manager using the Flatpack version.

My problem is that TB comes with a long list of languages variants, which I'd like to remove. For the spellchecking to work, I find myself often having to switch between English UK and French. But when I click on the lower right corner on the current language, I'm presented with a long list of lang variants, which i don't need. I'd like to keep French and English UK. This list is the same as in Settings > Composition.

I do not have any dictionary installed beside French.

How can I remove all these variants ?

Thanks in advance

title: Settings to accept only one address from GMAIL, block all others from gmail.com
content:

My account has been flooded with "JUNK" from many computer generated, unwanted GMAIL addresses. I do, however, have one friend with a GMAIL address from whom I would like to receive emails. Let's say his address is "bob123@gmail.com".

So, is it possible to configure TBird filter settings to receive all emails from "bob123.gmail.com" while blocking all other emails from GMAIL?

Thanks, Steve
